name: "The Ranch": Part Two Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In Beau's will, to which one of the boys was he going to leave Iron River Ranch to in "Merry Christmas (Wherever You Are)"?
questions.correct: He was going to leave it to Colt
options: He left instructions for Dale to have it
He was going to leave it to Rooster
He decided he didn't want either boy to have it
questions.explanation:
He was going to leave it to Colt.

	Because Rooster left him for a job at the My Little Pony Ranch operated by Newman's Hill, Beau decided he was going to leave the ranch to Colt. Maggie told him after Beau's death, Colt would give half to Rooster.

questions.text: After learning of her shellfish allergy, where did Colt tell Abby he was going to take her on a date instead of Red Lobster in "I Know She Still Loves Me"?
questions.explanation:
Outback Steakhouse.

	Colt brought Abby lilies which she was allergic to, so he threw them out her door. He then told her he was going to take her to Red Lobster and she told him she was allergic to shellfish. He thought her name was Abby Gail and Abby corrected him saying her full name is Abigail.

questions.text: What was the name of the TV weather girl that had the Bennet men enamored in "Let's Fall to Pieces Together"?
questions.explanation:
Tonya Showers.

	Beau saw Tonya change her own oil while he was at Autozone, and he respected her for being able to do that. Whenever he saw her on TV, he took off his hat and held it to his heart. Beau was upset with Colt and Rooster for not texting him when Tonya showed up for the Christmas party at Maggie's Bar in "Merry Christmas (Wherever You Are)".

questions.text: In the episode "Gone as a Girl Can Get", what does Rooster refer to as an Irish lullaby?
questions.correct: A shot of Jameson and a shot of Nyquil
options: A shot of gunpowder and a shot of Nyquil
A shot of tequilla and a shot of Nyquil
A shot of vodka and a shot of Nyquil
questions.explanation:
A shot of Jameson and a shot of Nyquil.

	Colt told Rooster he was having trouble sleeping so he would get up to drink a beer which made him get up and pee. He did this several times before throwing up. Rooster told him to try a shot of Jameson (whiskey) and a shot of Nyquil which he called the Irish lullaby. Rooster warned him not to try a shot of tequila and a shot of Nyquil because that is known as the Mexican nightmare.

questions.text: For Christmas in "Merry Christmas (Wherever You Are)", Colt and Rooster bought Maggie beer tap handles in the shape of what two animals?
questions.explanation:
Colt and rooster.

	Colt and Rooster were really proud of the beer tap heads they bought Maggie. They also gave her a picture of the three them together on the day she bought the bar.

questions.text: In "Merry Christmas (Wherever You Are)", Abby revealed to Colt that she was pregnant as part of his Christmas present.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Colt went back to the ranch to get the engagement ring he was going to give Abby for Christmas. When he walked outside, Heather was standing beside her car. She told Colt that she was pregnant to end part two of "The Ranch".

questions.text: According to Abby in "Living and Living Well", how old was Rooster when he stopped wetting the bed?
questions.explanation:
Fourteen.

	Abby warned Rooster that she would tell people he was wetting the bed until he was fourteen. Rooster got upset at Colt because he thought his brother told her, but Colt assured Rooster he didn't. Abby had just guessed correctly.

questions.text: In "I've Come to Expect It From You", on one of their dates Colt took Abby to the arcade where they had their first date in high school. What had taken the place of the arcade?
questions.explanation:
Laundromat.

	Colt told Abby that Rick had to sell the arcade after there was a problem with some boy scouts. Colt also found her some large sunglasses which they bought with tickets won at the arcade in high school. After their date, Colt and Abby went back to her house where Colt found out she likes foreign movies and to read, while Colt likes Johnny Knoxville movies and doesn't like to read.

questions.text: In "I Know She Still Loves Me", where did Maggie want her half of the ranch to go after her divorce from Beau?
questions.correct: Maggie wanted Colt and Rooster to have it
options: Maggie wanted it to stay in her name
Maggie wanted Beau to have it
Maggie was going to give it to Newman's Hill
questions.explanation:
Maggie wanted Colt and Rooster to have it.

	Beau threw a fit when he found out Maggie wanted Rooster and Colt to have half of the ranch. Jerry, Maggie's lawyer, told them if they couldn't come to a decision, the ranch would be sold and the money divided.

questions.text: Which star of "That '70s Show" guest starred as Umberto in several episodes of "The Ranch"?
questions.explanation:
Wilmer Valderrama.

	Wilmer Valderrama began his guest stint on "The Ranch" in the episode, "The Cowboy Rides Away". He played Umberto, a ranch hand at the My Little Pony ranch.
